headline: Standard Chartered Warns Stablecoins Could Drain Bank Deposits by 2028
summary: The bank estimates up to $500 billion in deposits could shift as stablecoin supply grows and US crypto legislation advances.

headline: Coinbase: Baird starts at Neutral as volume weakness and regulatory risks loom
summary: Investing.com -- In a note to clients on Wednesday, Baird initiated coverage of Coinbase with a Neutral rating, citing a balanced risk-reward profile amid weakening trading activity and ongoing regulatory uncertainty.

headline: Coinbase Expands Infrastructure And Derivatives As Valuation Signals Mixed Outlook
summary: Coinbase Global (NasdaqGS:COIN) has completed its acquisition of crypto derivatives exchange Deribit, expanding its institutional offering. The company has launched Base, an Ethereum Layer 2 network, as a new potential revenue source linked to on chain activity. Coinbase has formed an advisory board focused on quantum computing risks to Bitcoin cryptography and broader cybersecurity threats. Coinbase Global, trading at around $210.83, has seen mixed share performance, with a 25.2% decline...

headline: Is Coinbase (COIN) Becoming the Market’s Crypto Infrastructure Utility or a Rising Risk Hub?
summary: In recent months, Coinbase has seen accelerating institutional crypto adoption, expanded fee-based revenue from custody and derivatives, and new income streams from its Ethereum Layer-2 network, Base, reinforced by the completed acquisition of options platform Deribit and broader industry interest in regulated ETF structures. At the same time, the company is contending with regulatory uncertainty around stablecoin rewards, fallout from a major 2025 security breach, and growing attention to...
